title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. I, pt. 12 - Agent Training Allowance Subsidies For Certain Life Insurance And Annuity Business
content:

State Regulations
§ 12.1 - Applicability
§ 12.2 - Maximum training allowance subsidies

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. I, pt. 12

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 4228

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
